## indiamap

```{r header, echo=FALSE}
library(indiamap)
library(ggplot2)

plt1 <- plot_map(regions = "states", data = statepop, values = "pop_2024", linewidth = 0.2) +
  scale_fill_continuous(low = "green", high = "red", guide = "none")

plt2 <- plot_map(regions = "states", data = statepop, values = "pop_2024", include = c("UP", "MP", "RJ", "PB", "HR", "NCT"), linewidth = 0.2, labels = TRUE)  +
  scale_fill_continuous(low = "green", high = "red", guide = "none")

wb <- plot_map("districts", data = wb_2011, values = "pop_2011", include = "WB")  +
  scale_fill_continuous(low = "green", high = "red", guide = "none")

cowplot::plot_grid(plt1, plt2, wb, nrow = 1)
```


## Installation

You can install the development version of indiamap from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("shubhamdutta26/indiamap")
```
